titles.title: North American Wetlands Conservation Extension Act of 2013
North American Wetlands Conservation Extension Act of 2014
A bill to extend the authorization of appropriations to carry out approved wetlands conservation projects under the North American Wetlands Conservation Act through fiscal year 2017.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Boxer with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 113-187.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 417.

bill.summary: 4/16/2013--Introduced. North American Wetlands Conservation Extension Act of 2013 - Amends the North American Wetlands Conservation Act to extend through FY2017 the authorization of appropriations for allocations to carry out approved wetlands conservation projects.
